txt.p: The Yellowstone Historic Center approached us to attract more visitors,
and help set the stage for a national fund-raising effort. We focused on
the museum’s Western Heritage, Western Travel, and Yellowstone
National Park collections to establish a singular image for this national

We crafted a logotype reminiscent of the museum’s collection. Various icons are used with the logotype, including train depot, stage line, Old Faithful and bus icons. As the museum expands, the identity system is set to include additional icons adapted for print, environments and merchandising.
